recipe.title: Chocolate Peanut Butter Cup Cheesecakes Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 1 cup ; chocolate chips, melted and cooled ; (175 g)

steps.step: In a bowl, beat cream cheese, sugar, and flour until smooth.
Add eggs and mix until combined.
Fold in melted chocolate and vanilla extract.
Line a muffin tin with muffin liners. Place a peanut butter cup upside down in each cup.
Fill cups ¾-full with cheesecake mixture.
Bake 20 minutes, cool completely, and refrigerate for 3 hours.

steps_updated.steps_updated: In a bowl, beat cream cheese, sugar, and flour until smooth.
Add eggs and mix until combined.
Fold in melted chocolate and vanilla extract.
Line a muffin tin with muffin liners.
Place a peanut butter cup upside down in each cup.
Fill cups ¾-full with cheesecake mixture.
Bake 20 minutes, cool completely, and refrigerate for 3 hours.
